name: The Coca-Cola Company
brief_description: The Coca‑Cola Company is a total beverage company with products sold in more than 200 countries and territories. Their purpose is to refresh the world and make a difference. They sell multiple billion-dollar brands across several beverage categories worldwide.
services: They offer a portfolio of sparkling soft drink brands which includes Coca‑Cola, Sprite and Fanta. Their water, sports, coffee and tea brands include Dasani, smartwater, vitaminwater, Topo Chico, BODYARMOR, Powerade, Costa, Georgia, Gold Peak and Ayataka. Their juice, value-added dairy and plant-based beverage brands include Minute Maid, Simply, innocent, Del Valle, fairlife and AdeS.

name: Ternium
brief_description: Ternium (NYSE:TX) is the largest steel producer in Latin America with production centers in Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, the United States, Guatemala, and Mexico. They have an extensive network of service and distribution centers in the continent and participate in the control group of Usiminas, a leading company in the Brazilian steel market.
